name: Bike Offroad Racing
description:
Bike Offroad Racing game allows you to fully enjoy a whole new concept of dirt bike racing game in the mid of real safari desert. Dust off the real dirt tracks while racing with the world Moto bike champions and beat them in no time

Top Features of Bike Offroad Racing:
• Amazing desert terrain and marvelous high quality graphics.
• Most realistic physics-based desert bike simulator.
• Beautiful background music and sound tracks.
• Dangerous and tricky stunts to perform.
• Difficult hurdles and obstacles to cross with impossible dirt tracks.
• Addictive and smooth gameplay with easy controls.
• Cash rewards for completing each stunt racing mission.
• Nitro booster to give you the maximum throttle.
• Multiple trail bikes and superbikes to ride.
• Different camera view angles to give most realistic superbike simulation effect.
